original_text: Him that dieth of Jeroboam in the city shall the dogs eat; and him that dieth in the field shall the fowls of the air eat: for the Lord hath spoken it.
korean_text: 여로보암에게 속한 자가 성읍에서 죽은즉 개가 먹고 들에서 죽은즉 공중의 새가 먹으리니 이는 여호와께서 말씀하셨음이니라 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: Him that dieth of Jeroboam in the city
sentences.korean_translation: 여로보암의 집안 중에서 성읍에서 죽은 자는

sentences.original_text: and him that dieth in the field
shall the fowls of the air eat
for the Lord hath spoken it
